alert.note: Alert for Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 10:25AM CDT until May 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois...Missouri... Mississippi River at Keokuk LD19, Gregory Landing, Keithsburg, New Boston LD17, Muscatine, Ill. City LD16, Rock Island LD15, Le Claire LD14, Fulton LD13, Camanche, Burlington, Gladstone LD18, Dubuque LD11, and Dubuque. .Heavy rain will fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers will increase quickly and reach critical levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Ill. City LD16. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water affects the state park campground at Fairport. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage the morning of May 17th and continue falling to 14.5 feet on May 18th. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
